title: Bug 120216 - Group dialog not shown when dataset is not set
OB: When a table report item is added without setting the dataset, and the user tries to create a new table group, the group dialog is not shown.
EB: The group dialog should be shown even when the dataset is not set. Users should be able to define a group, regardless of whether the dataset is defined or not.
SR:
1. Add a table report item without setting the dataset.
2. Try to create a new table group.
